H0.text: Water (H₂O), rust (Fe₂O₃), and salt (NaCl) are atoms.

H1.text: Water, rust, and salt are mixtures.

H2.text: Water (H₂O), rust (Fe₂O₃), and salt (NaCl) are elements.

H3.text: Water, rust, and salt are compounds.

A4.text: Any substance consisting of two or more different types of atoms (chemical elements) in a fixed stoichiometric proportion can be termed a chemical compound

A5.text: A molecule is an electrically neutral group of two or more atoms held together by chemical bonds
